Abomination.card_desc: [Calamity Blast] Generate {scale=3|3}% Power Siphon charge for each enemy hit with Calamity Blast.

Blood and Stone.card_desc: [Shatterfall] Gain {scale=10|10}% Power Siphon charge for each enemy hit by Shatterfall.

Crush.card_desc: [Shatterfall] Shatterfall Stuns enemies hit for 1s, but no longer Slows.

Decimation.card_desc: [Calamity Blast] Each Calamity Blast deals an additional 100 damage.

Despoiler.card_desc: [Shatterfall] Heal for {scale=100|100} for each enemy hit with Shatterfall.

Devastation.card_desc: [Calamity Blast] Heal for {scale=60|60} for each enemy hit by Calamity Blast.

Forsaken.card_desc: [Armor] Generate {scale=10|10}% of a Calamity Blast charge for each enemy hit with Massacre Axe.

It Follows.card_desc: [Calamity Blast] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=2|2}% for each Calamity Charge you have.

It Waits.card_desc: [Power Siphon] Reduce the Cooldown of Shatterfall by {scale=0.3|0.3}s for every 1s spent channeling Power Siphon.

It Watches.card_desc: [Armor] Generate {scale=3|3}% Power Siphon charge for each enemy hit with Massacre Axe.

Necromantic Might.card_desc: [Power Siphon] Reduce the damage required to generate a Calamity Blast charge by {scale=120|120}.

Playing God.card_desc: [Power Siphon] Heal for {scale=3|3}% of the damage Absorbed by Power Siphon.

Powerslave.card_desc: [Power Siphon] Reduce the Movement Speed penalty during Power Siphon by {scale=15|15}%.

Strength of Stone.card_desc: [Calamity Blast] Reduce your damage taken by up to {scale=4|4}% based on the number of Calamity Blast charges you have stored.

Undying.card_desc: [Armor] Reduce the damage you take by 20% while at or below 40% Health.

Unfeeling.card_desc: [Shatterfall] Reduce your damage taken by {scale=8|8}% for 3s after landing with Shatterfall.

We Can Rebuild Him.card_desc: [Armor] Receive {scale=5|5}% increased Healing while at or below 50% Health.

Wrecking Ball.card_desc: [Shatterfall] Increase the leap distance of Shatterfall by {scale=10|10}%.

Abrissbirne.card_desc: [Schmettersturz] Erhöht die Sprungweite von Schmettersturz um {scale=10|10}%.

Beobachter.card_desc: [Rüstung] Für jeden mit der Massakeraxt getroffenen Gegner lädt Energievortex um {scale=3|3}% auf.

Blut und Stein.card_desc: [Schmettersturz] Für jeden mit Schmettersturz getroffenen Gegner lädt Energievortex um {scale=10|10}% auf.

Dezimierung.card_desc: [Fatale Entladung] Schüsse mit Fatale Entladung verursachen je 100 Schaden mehr.

Gef\u00fchlsk\u00e4lte.card_desc: [Schmettersturz] Nach der Landung mit Schmettersturz wird erlittener Schaden 3s lang um {scale=8|8}% reduziert.

Gott spielen.card_desc: [Energievortex] Du wirst um {scale=3|3}% des mit Energievortex absorbierten Schadens geheilt.

Gr\u00e4uel.card_desc: [Fatale Entladung] Für jeden mit Fatale Entladung getroffenen Gegner lädt Energievortex um {scale=3|3}% auf.

Konsequenz.card_desc: [Fatale Entladung] Erhöht dein Lauftempo für jede Energieladung um {scale=2|2}%.

Monstrosit\u00e4t.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=150|150} LP.

Nekromantie.card_desc: [Energievortex] Reduziert den zur Erzeugung einer Energieladung benötigten Schaden um {scale=120|120}.

Plackerei.card_desc: [Energievortex] Reduziert die Selbstverlangsamung durch Energievortex um {scale=15|15}%.

Pl\u00fcnderer.card_desc: [Schmettersturz] Für jeden mit Schmettersturz getroffenen Gegner wirst du {scale=100|100} LP geheilt.

Rekonstruktion.card_desc: [Rüstung] Bei 50% oder weniger Gesundheit erhältst du um {scale=5|5}% erhöhte Heilung.

Steinerne St\u00e4rke.card_desc: [Fatale Entladung] Abhängig von der Anzahl gespeicherter Ladungen wird erlittener Schaden um bis zu {scale=4|4}% reduziert.

Unverw\u00fcstlich.card_desc: [Rüstung] Bei 40% oder weniger Gesundheit wird erlittener Schaden um 20% reduziert.

Verlassen.card_desc: [Rüstung] Für jeden mit der Massakeraxt getroffenen Gegner werden {scale=10|10}% einer Energieladung erzeugt.

Verw\u00fcstung.card_desc: [Fatale Entladung] Für jeden mit Fatale Ladung getroffenen Gegner wirst du {scale=60|60} LP geheilt.

Wartezeit.card_desc: [Energievortex] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Schmettersturz um {scale=0.3|0.3}s für jede Sekunde, die Energievortex kanalisiert wird.

Zerquetschen.card_desc: [Schmettersturz] Von Schmettersturz getroffene Gegner werden statt verlangsamt 1s lang betäubt.

Abomination.card_desc: [Choc cataclysmique] Atteindre un ennemi avec Choc cataclysmique recharge {scale=3|3}% du Siphon de puissance.

Boule de d\u00e9molition.card_desc: [Pulvérisation] La distance de Pulvérisation augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

De sang, de pierre.card_desc: [Pulvérisation] Vous obtenez {scale=10|10}% de charge de Siphon de puissance par ennemi touché par Pulvérisation.

D\u00e9laiss\u00e9.card_desc: [Armure] Vous générez {scale=10|10}% d'une charge de Cataclysme par ennemi touché avec la Massacreuse.

D\u00e9pouill\u00e9s.card_desc: [Pulvérisation] Vous regagnez {scale=100|100} PV par ennemi touché avec Pulvérisation.

D\u00e9solation.card_desc: [Choc cataclysmique] Vous regagnez {scale=60|60} PV par ennemi touché avec Choc cataclysmique.

\u00c9crasement.card_desc: [Pulvérisation] Le ralentissement est remplacé par un étourdissement de 1s.

Extermination.card_desc: [Choc cataclysmique] Chaque projectile de Choc cataclysmique inflige 100 dégâts de plus.

G\u00e9oforce.card_desc: [Choc cataclysmique] Vous subissez jusqu'à {scale=4|4}% de dégâts en moins selon les charges emmagasinées.

Immortel.card_desc: [Armure] En dessous de 40% de PV, vous subissez 20% de dégâts en moins.

Infatigable.card_desc: [Choc cataclysmique] Votre vitesse augmente de {scale=2|2}% par charge de Cataclysme.

Insensible.card_desc: [Pulvérisation] Vous subissez {scale=8|8}% de dégâts en moins pendant 3s après Pulvérisation.

Les yeux riv\u00e9s.card_desc: [Arme/Armure] Vous rechargez {scale=3|3}% du Siphon de puissance par ennemi touché avec la Massacreuse.

M\u00e9galomanie.card_desc: [Siphon de puissance] {scale=3|3}% des dégâts absorbés par Siphon de puissance sont transformés en soin.

Monstre de puissance.card_desc: [Siphon de puissance] Le ralentissement de Siphon de puissance diminue de {scale=15|15}%.

Patience.card_desc: [Siphon de puissance] Siphon de puissance réduit le temps de recharge de Pulvérisation de {scale=0.3|0.3}s chaque seconde.

Pouvoir du n\u00e9cromant.card_desc: [Siphon de puissance] La génération d'une charge nécessite {scale=120|120} dégâts de moins.

Reconstruction.card_desc: [Armure] En dessous de 50% de PV, vous recevez {scale=5|5}% de soins en plus.

\u4e0d\u6b7b.card_desc: [护甲] 生命值在40%以下时获得35%的伤害减免

\u51dd\u89c6.card_desc: [灾厄冲击] 被灾厄冲击命中的敌人会显形1秒

\u5c48\u670d.card_desc: [能量虹吸] 吸收能量时对自身的减速效果降低{scale=15|15}%

\u5f85\u547d\u4e2d.card_desc: [Power Siphon] Every 1s channeling Power Siphon reduces the cooldown of Shatterfall by {scale=0.2|0.2}s.

\u626e\u6f14\u795e\u660e.card_desc: [能量虹吸] 吸收伤害的{scale=5|5}%会转化为生命值

\u632b\u9aa8\u626c\u7070.card_desc: [Calamity Blast] Kills with Calamity Blast generate 4 new Charges. {scale=30|-5}s Cooldown.

\u63a0\u593a\u8005.card_desc: [裂地落击] 裂地落击每击中一个敌人，回复{scale=100|100}点生命

\u6bc1\u706d\u6295\u63b7.card_desc: [裂地落击] 增加{scale=10|10}%裂地落击的跳跃距离

\u6df1\u6076\u75db\u7edd.card_desc: [灾厄冲击] 灾厄冲击会使敌方受到的治疗效果降低 {scale=4|4}%，持续2秒

\u6f20\u7136.card_desc: [裂地落击] 落地后2秒内获得{scale=8|8}8%的伤害减免

\u706d\u7edd.card_desc: [Charge Blast] Charge blasts deal an additional 100 damage each.

\u77f3\u4e4b\u529b.card_desc: [灾厄冲击] 基于你存储的灾祸充能，最多获得{scale=4|4}%的伤害减免

\u7c89\u788e.card_desc: [裂地落击] 裂地落击时对敌人造成的减速效果换为眩晕1秒

\u8840\u4e0e\u77f3.card_desc: [Shatterfall] Gain {scale=10|10}% Lifesteal against enemies affected by Shatterfall for 3s.

\u8ddf\u4e0a\u6765.card_desc: [护甲] 你的移动速度不会被降至{scale=60|10}%以下

\u91cd\u5851\u4e4b\u8eaf.card_desc: [护甲] 当生命值低于50%时，获得的治疗效果增加{scale=5|5}%

\u9b54\u80fd\u4e4b\u529b.card_desc: [能量虹吸] 减少{scale=100|100}点产生灾厄充能所需吸收的伤害量

Abandono.card_desc: [Armadura] Explosión catastrófica se recarga un {scale=10|10}% por cada enemigo alcanzado por Hacha masacre.

Abominaci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Explosión catastrófica] Recargas Sifón de poder un {scale=3|3}% por cada enemigo que alcanzas con Explosión catastrófica.

Acecha.card_desc: [Sifón de poder] Se reduce la recarga de Caída devastadora en {scale=0.3|0.3}s por cada 1s que canalizas Sifón de poder.

Aniquilaci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Explosión catastrófica] Cada Explosión catastrófica inflige 100 PS de daño adicional.

Aplastar.card_desc: [Caída devastadora] Aturdes a los enemigos alcanzados durante 1s, pero ya no ralentiza.

Bola demoledora.card_desc: [Caída devastadora] Aumenta la distancia del salto de Caída devastadora un {scale=10|10}%.

Devastaci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Explosión catastrófica] Te curas {scale=60|60} PS por cada enemigo que alcanzas con Explosión catastrófica.

Esclavo del poder.card_desc: [Sifón de poder] Se reduce la sanción de velocidad de movimiento durante Sifón de poder un {scale=15|15}%.

Expoliador.card_desc: [Caída devastadora] Te curas {scale=100|100} PS por cada enemigo que golpeas con Caída devastadora.

Inmortal.card_desc: [Armadura] Se reduce el daño recibido un 20% si tu salud está al 40% o menos.

Insensible.card_desc: [Caída devastadora] Se reduce el daño recibido un {scale=8|8}% durante 3s después de aterrizar con Caída devastadora.

Jugar a ser Dios.card_desc: [Sifón de poder] Te curas un {scale=3|3}% del daño absorbido por Sifón de poder.

Monstruosidad gigante.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu salud máxima aumenta en {scale=150|150} PS.

Poder de la roca.card_desc: [Explosión catastrófica] Se reduce el daño recibido hasta un {scale=4|4}% según el número de cargas de Explosión catastrófica acumuladas.

Poder nigrom\u00e1ntico.card_desc: [Sifón de poder] Se reduce el daño requerido para generar una Explosión catastrófica en {scale=120|120}.

Reconstrucci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Armadura] La curación recibida aumenta un {scale=5|5}% si tienes un 50% o menos de salud.

Sangre y piedra.card_desc: [Caída devastadora] Sifón de poder se carga un {scale=10|10}% con cada enemigo alcanzado con Caída devastadora.

Te mira.card_desc: [Armadura] Sifón de poder se recarga un {scale=3|3}% por cada enemigo alcanzado por Hacha masacre.

Te persigue.card_desc: [Explosión catastrófica] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=2|2}% por cada carga de calamidad que tengas.

Abandono.card_desc: [Armadura] Gera {scale=10|10}% de Cargas Cataclísmicas para cada inimigo atingido pelo Machado Massacre.

Abomina\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Carga Cataclísmica] Gera {scale=3|3}% do Sifão de Poder a cada inimigo atingido pela Carga Cataclísmica.

Bancando o Deus.card_desc: [Sifão de Poder] Você se cura em {scale=3|3}% do dano absorvido pelo Sifão de Poder.

Bola de Demoli\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Rachador] Aumenta em {scale=10|10}% a distância do salto do Rachador.

Devasta\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Carga Cataclísmica] Você se cura em {scale=60|60} de vida a cada inimigo atingido com a Carga Cataclísmica.

Dizima\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Carga Cataclísmica] Cada Carga Cataclísmica causa 100 a mais de dano.

Ele Segue.card_desc: [Carga Cataclísmica] Aumenta a velocidade de movimento em {scale=2|2}% para cada Carga Cataclísmica que você tiver.

Escravo do Poder.card_desc: [Sifão de Poder] Reduz em {scale=15|15}% a penalidade de movimento aplicada ao usar o Sifão de Poder.

Esmagar.card_desc: [Rachador] Rachador atordoa por 1s os inimigos atingidos, mas não causa mais lentidão.

Estou Te Vendo.card_desc: [Armadura] Gera {scale=3|3}% de carga do Sifão de Poder para cada inimigo atingido pelo Machado Massacre.

For\u00e7a Necrom\u00e2ntica.card_desc: [Sifão de Poder] Reduz em {scale=120|120} o dano que precisa ser absorvido para gerar uma Carga Cataclísmica.

Forte como Rocha.card_desc: [Carga Cataclísmica] Reduz o dano recebido em até {scale=4|4}% baseado no número de Cargas Cataclísmicas que tem estocadas.

Imortal.card_desc: [Armadura] Recebe 20% menos dano enquanto estiver com 40% ou menos de vida.

Insens\u00edvel.card_desc: [Rachador] Reduz em {scale=8|8}% o dano recebido por 3s após atingir o chão com o Rachador.

No Aguardo.card_desc: [Sifão de Poder] Reduz o intervalo do Rachador em {scale=0.3|0.3}s a cada 1s canalizando o Sifão de Poder.

Podemos Reconstru\u00ed-lo.card_desc: [Armadura] Recebe {scale=5|5}% mais cura se estiver com 50% ou menos de vida.

Sangue e Pedra.card_desc: [Rachador] Ganha {scale=10|10}% de carga do Sifão de Poder para cada inimigo atingido pelo Rachador.

Tungador.card_desc: [Rachador] Você se cura em {scale=100|100} de vida por cada inimigo atingido com o Rachador.

\u0411\u0435\u0441\u0441\u043c\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Броня] При уровне здоровья 40% и ниже входящий урон снижается на 20%.

\u0411\u0435\u0441\u0447\u0443\u0432\u04.card_desc: [Обрушение] После использования Обрушения вы получаете на {scale=8|8}% меньше урона в течение 3 с.

\u0418\u0433\u0440\u0430 \u0432 \u0431\u.card_desc: [Поле поглощения] Вы исцеляетесь на {scale=3|3}% от урона, поглощенного Полем поглощения.

\u041a\u0440\u043e\u0432\u044c \u0438 \u.card_desc: [Обрушение] Каждое попадание по врагу Обрушением дает {scale=10|10}% заряда Поля поглощения.

\u041a\u0440\u0443\u0448\u0435\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Обрушение] Обрушение оглушает задетых врагов на 1 с., но больше не замедляет их.

\u041b\u0438\u0448\u0435\u043d\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Обрушение] Каждое попадание по врагу Обрушением исцеляет вас на {scale=100|100} ед.

\u041c\u043e\u043d\u0441\u0442\u0440.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше максимальное здоровье повышается на {scale=150|150} ед.

\u041c\u044b \u043f\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0.card_desc: [Броня] При уровне здоровья 50% и ниже вы получаете на {scale=5|5}% больше исцеления.

\u041e\u043d\u043e \u0432\u044b\u0436\u0.card_desc: [Поле поглощения] Каждая секунда использования Поля поглощения сокращает перезарядку Обрушения на {scale=0.3|0.3} с.

\u041e\u043d\u043e \u0441\u043b\u0435\u0.card_desc: [Броня] Каждое попадание по врагу Топором для побоищ генерирует {scale=3|3}% заряда Поля поглощения.
[Взрывной заряд] За каждый имеющийся Взрывной заряд ваша скорость передвижения повышается на {scale=2|2}%.

\u041e\u043f\u0443\u0441\u0442\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Взрывной заряд] Каждое попадание по врагу Взрывным зарядом исцеляет вас на {scale=60|60} ед.

\u041e\u0442\u0432\u0440\u0430\u0449\u04.card_desc: [Взрывной заряд] За каждого врага, пораженного Взрывным зарядом, вы генерируете {scale=3|3}% Взрывного заряда.

\u041f\u043e\u043a\u0438\u043d\u0443\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Каждое попадание по врагу Топором для побоищ генерирует {scale=10|10}% Взрывного заряда.

\u0420\u0430\u0431 \u043c\u043e\u0433\u0.card_desc: [Поле поглощения] Штраф к скорости передвижения во время использования Поля поглощения снижается на {scale=15|15}%.

\u0421\u0438\u043b\u0430 \u043a\u0430\u0.card_desc: [Взрывной заряд] Вы получаете на {scale=4|4}% меньше урона в зависимости от накопленных Взрывных зарядов.

\u0421\u0438\u043b\u0430 \u043d\u0435\u0.card_desc: [Поле поглощения] Для генерации заряда требуется нанести на {scale=120|120} ед. меньше урона.

Abominacja.card_desc: [Wybuch nieszczęścia] Wytwarza {scale=3|3}% ładunku Wiru mocy za każdego wroga trafionego Wybuchem nieszczęścia.

Grabie\u017cca.card_desc: [Kaskada] Każde trafienie wroga Kaskadą przywraca {scale=100|100} PZ.

Inwigilacja.card_desc: [Pancerz] Każde trafienie wroga Toporem masakry wytwarza {scale=3|3}% ładunku Wiru mocy.

Krew i kamie\u0144.card_desc: [Kaskada] Zapewnia {scale=10|10}% ładunku Wiru mocy za każdego wroga trafionego Kaskadą.

Moc nekromanty.card_desc: [Wir mocy] Zmniejsza obrażenia wymagane do wytworzenia ładunku Wybuchu nieszczęścia o {scale=120|120}.

Mo\u017cemy go odbudowa\u0107.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zapewnia leczenie zwiększone o {scale=5|5}%, jeśli twoje zdrowie spadnie do poziomu 50% lub niżej.

Nieczu\u0142o\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Kaskada] Zmniejsza odnoszone przez ciebie obrażenia o {scale=8|8}% na 3 s po wylądowaniu z Kaskady.

Nieumar\u0142y.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zmniejsza odnoszone przez ciebie obrażenia o 20%, jeśli twój poziom zdrowia nie przekracza 40% PZ.

Niewolnik mocy.card_desc: [Wir mocy] Zmniejsza karę do szybkości ruchu podczas trwania Wiru mocy o {scale=15|15}%.

Oczekiwanie.card_desc: [Wir mocy] Każda sekunda aktywacji Wiru mocy skraca czas odnowienia Kaskady o {scale=0.3|0.3} s.

Pod\u0105\u017caj\u0105cy.card_desc: [Wybuch nieszczęścia] Zwiększa twoją szybkość ruchu o {scale=2|2}% na każdy posiadany przez ciebie ładunek Wybuchu nieszczęścia.

Przetrzebienie.card_desc: [Wybuch nieszczęścia] Każdy Wybuch nieszczęścia zadaje dodatkowo po 100 obrażeń.

Si\u0142a kamienia.card_desc: [Wybuch nieszczęścia] Zmniejsza obrażenia odnoszone przez ciebie o maks. {scale=4|4}%, w zależności od liczby posiadanych ładunków Wybuchu nieszczęścia.

Wielkie monstrum.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa poziom maks. zdrowia o {scale=150|150} PZ.

Zabawa w boga.card_desc: [Wir mocy] Przywraca ci PZ w wysokości {scale=3|3}% obrażeń pochłoniętych przez Wir mocy.

Zapomniany.card_desc: [Pancerz] Każde trafienie wroga Toporem masakry wytwarza {scale=10|10}% ładunku Wybuchu nieszczęścia.

Zgruchotanie.card_desc: [Kaskada] Ogłusza trafionych wrogów na 1 s, ale nie spowalnia ich.

Zniszczenie.card_desc: [Wybuch nieszczęścia] Przywraca ci {scale=60|60} PZ za każdego wroga trafionego Wybuchem nieszczęścia.

Beklemede.card_desc: [Güç Sifonu] Güç Sifonu'nun kullanıldığı her 1sn için Yıkım Düşüşü'nün Beklemesi {scale=0.3|0.3}sn azalır.

B\u00fcy\u00fcc\u00fc Kudreti.card_desc: [Güç Sifonu] Felaket Saçan yüklemesi yapmak için gereken hasarı {scale=120|120} azalt.

Ez.card_desc: [Yıkım Düşüşü] Yıkım Düşüşü düşmanları 1 saniyeliğine sersemletir ama Yavaşlatma uygulamaz.

G\u00f6zetim Alt\u0131nda.card_desc: [Zırh] Katliam Baltası ile vurduğun her düşman için %{scale=3|3} Güç Sifonu oluştur.

G\u00fc\u00e7 K\u00f6lesi.card_desc: [Güç Sifonu]  Güç Sifonu sırasında Hareket Hızı Cezasını %{scale=15|15} azalt.

Kan ve Ta\u015f.card_desc: [Yıkım Düşüşü] Yıkım Düşüşü ile vurulan her düşman için Güç Sifonu'nu %{scale=10|10} doldur.

K\u0131r\u0131m.card_desc: [Felaket Saçan] Her Felaket Saçan atışı ek 100 hasar verir.

Menfur.card_desc: [Felaket Saçan] Felaket Saçan ile vurulan her düşman için %{scale=3|3} Güç Sifonu yüklemesi oluştur.

Merhametsiz.card_desc: [Yıkım Düşüşü] Yıkım Düşüşü ile yere indikten sonra 3 sn boyunca %{scale=8|8} Hasar Azaltma kazan.

\u00d6lmez.card_desc: [Zırh] %40 Can veya altındayken aldığın hasarı %20 azalt.

Onu Ba\u015ftan Yaratabiliriz.card_desc: [Zırh] Canın %50 veya altındayken %{scale=5|5} artırılmış İyileşme kazan.

Pe\u015finde.card_desc: [Felaket Saçan] Sahip olduğun her Felaket Yüklemesi için Hareket Hızını %{scale=2|2} artır.

Soyguncu.card_desc: [Yıkım Düşüşü] Yıkım Düşüşü ile vurduğun her düşman için {scale=100|100} Can iyileş.

Tanr\u0131 M\u0131s\u0131n.card_desc: [Güç Sifonu] Güç Sifonu ile Emilen hasarın %{scale=3|3} kadarı iyileş.

Ta\u015f\u0131n G\u00fcc\u00fc.card_desc: [Felaket Saçan] Biriktirdiğin Felaket Saçan yüklemesine bağlı olarak aldığın hasarı %{scale=4|4} azalt.

Terk Edilmi\u015f.card_desc: [Zırh] Katliam Baltası ile vurduğun her düşman için %{scale=10|10} Felaket Saçan oluştur.

Virane.card_desc: [Felaket Saçan] Felaket Saçan ile vurduğun her düşman için {scale=60|60} Can iyileş.

Y\u0131k\u0131m G\u00fcllesi.card_desc: [Yıkım Düşüşü] Yıkım Düşüşü'nün sıçrama mesafesini %{scale=10|10} artır.
